Uses of Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.AppPublics.BroadcastListener

  • Packages that use AppPublics.BroadcastListener 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
    Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.app  

    • Uses of AppPublics.BroadcastListener in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

      Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app that implement AppPublics.BroadcastListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener
      A broadcast listener which listens only to AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION intents.
      static class  AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener
      A broadcast listener which only watch after AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION UI loading intents action.
      static class  AppPublics.ReloadBroadcastListener
      A broadcast listener which only watch after AppPublics#LOAD_ACTION loading intent actions.
      class  SmartSplashScreenActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass>
      A basis activity class which is displayed while the application is loading.
      Methods in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app that return AppPublics.BroadcastListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppPublics.BroadcastListener AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider.getBroadcastListener()
      This method will be invoked by the framework for registering a AppPublics.BroadcastListener.
      AppPublics.BroadcastListener AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider.getBroadcastListener(int index)
      This method is bound to be invoked successfully by the framework with a index argument ranging from 0 to getBroadcastListenersCount() - 1.

      void Smarted.registerBroadcastListeners(AppPublics.BroadcastListener[] broadcastListeners)
